entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Belleville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:32 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, 1.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Trenton 12:30 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
Condition: Light Snowshower
Temperature: 1.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 65 %
Dewpoint: -4.2°C
Wind: WNW 24 km/h gust 46 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
